tables.user:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_user` (
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_published` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_verified` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_approved` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `catalog_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `photo_file_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `profile_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `email` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `gender` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `modified_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `comment_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `share_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `member_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `like_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `follow_count` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `privacy_type` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '1',
  `privacy_value` bigint(20) unsigned DEFAULT '1',
  `privacy_text` text,
  `role_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '5',
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.user_attribute_value:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_user_attribute_value` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `item_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `field_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `value` text,
  `value_int` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `value_text` text,
  `value_date` date DEFAULT NULL,
  `value_decimal` decimal(10,0) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.user_auth_password:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_user_auth_password` (
  `password_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `is_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL,
  `enctype` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default',
  `hash` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `salt` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  `modified_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`password_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.user_auth_remote:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_user_auth_remote` (
  `remote_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `remote_uid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `remote_service` varchar(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `created_at` datetime NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`remote_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.user_token:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_user_token` (
  `token_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `user_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `viewer_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `viewer_type` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `data_text` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`token_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
